website_summaries.verdict: The simple design is timeless, making these glasses a perfect fit for any occasion.
pros: Glasses are thin, but durable and dishwasher-safe
Width of the glasses is comfortable to hold
The classic, simplistic design works well for both formal and casual events
Rim of the glass is smooth
Glasses are backed by a lifetime warranty
cons: Mouth of glass is quite narrow, not ideal for hand washing

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful glasses! I was a bit hesitant to buy glasses online. I am very picky with a tableware and I like a good glass craftsmanship (I do not like glasses which have a think circle on top of them, which stands out). These glasses are absolutely gorgeous, look like expensive glasses. Skinny, light yet seem durable. They are also of perfect width and are very easy to hold. I bought two more sets after I received the first one as I think they might be used for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Dan and Eva Hatt

customer_reviews.title: very pretty and light weight
customer_reviews.text: They are very attractive glasses but nothing fancy(which is what I was looking for). The glass feels very thin and made me nervous when I first took them out of the packaging because I have children that would be using them. But I have had them now for over a week w/no accidents. They are washed in the dishwasher every night with no issues and have been placed in the sink w/other dishes and no breaks so far. I am very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina

customer_reviews.title: HIGHBALL ANYONE?
customer_reviews.text: Good looking glasses. Feel great in my hand, especially when full. Purchased specifically for one of my favorite cocktails.
customer_reviews.author: Not too often.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this lead free Crystal highball glass? It is absolutely delightful to hold in my hand. There hasn't been a day since I have got it that I haven't used it and for every conceivable type of drink, ice tea is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great glass with so many uses!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews, I ordered my set of 4 highball glasses, and I've been using them every day! They really are perfect and were exactly what I was looking for. I've been using them for water, cocktails, affogatos, and wine spritzers. They're wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Judy T

customer_reviews.title: Nice glass. Dishwasher safe. Fair price for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: The glass is nice. A little on the smaller size (14.2 oz) and thin. At first I was concerned about how thin the glasses were, and I put them in the dishwasher and they are indeed dishwasher safe. The glasses are made in China, and not the U.S. I believe the seller is correcting the information in the Q&A though. Overall, a nice product, and the seller provided excellent customer service when I expressed concerns about the product description. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Expecting great things from these beautiful glasses
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set of highballs as a gift for a family member. Haven't gifted them to him yet, but they appear to be very high quality. Arrived in classy packaging, all pieces thoroughly padded and still in tact. Seller was very attentive and interested in my satisfaction with the product which was refreshing and reassuring. Expecting great things from these beautiful glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Maybe its just me but my water tastes better (hahaha)! I bought 3 sets (4 glasses in ...
customer_reviews.text: Product : Clear, heavy base. Elegant looking. Maybe its just me but my water tastes better (hahaha)! I bought 3 sets (4 glasses in each box) so a total of 12 glasses. I checked them all, no cracks, no broken glass, perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for having a summer cocktail out on the deck
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive glasses, and the perfect size for having a cocktail out on the deck. I have to admit I was concerned that they were very fragile as one arrived broken but I think that it was poor handling as they are stable and seem to be robust, they have gone through the dishwasher a couple of times. They have quite a thin rim with no ridge which I like, it makes them feel good quality. (BTW Amazon were great at giving me a credit for the broken glass).
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: One shattered from ice cubes - good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Edit: in response to my review the company sent me a new full set of glasses which was much appreciated. It also came with a card for a lifetime warranty, so we are happy to give these glasses a shot since we do like them! Hoping these stand the test of time. These are nice looking glasses with simple clean lines and held up a few weeks until one shattered while getting ice from the fridge door. They are obviously way too thin at the top if an ice cube can break off a piece. When I went to pour out the ice the rest of the glass also shattered. Was hoping these would replace our good set.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a party I was hosting. The guests were so impressed of them . They look beautiful and have a nice feel to them. The packaging looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy sturdy base but thin as paper in the middle
customer_reviews.text: The shape and size is perfect but the glass in the center is extremely thin. Easily broken by doing nothing more than dropping some ice into the glass. I'm down one already in just over a month. Recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy..poor quality..all broke within 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT waste your money. Bought in early may and by mid June all have been broken by normal use and dishwasher washing. chips, cracks and breaks ...very fragile and terrible quality. p.s. I'm not usually a review person..these are so bad I feel the need to warn others
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses, treat them with care!
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. Just wanted to write a short review to assure other potential buyers that these are a great quality item. These glasses came packaged very well, no breaks or damages. They seem a little fragile and delicate when you're holding them, but they're really beautiful and seem like they'll hold up great if you treat them with care. I hand-wash mine with a scrubbing wand, and haven't had any issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: BlankShore

customer_reviews.title: Very thin glass and breaks in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very very thin and fairly fragile. I carefully placed it in the dishwasher to wash it, however the top rim separated off somehow after only the 2nd time it was washed in there. I would not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: T. C

customer_reviews.title: Glasses broke in dishwasher before using them (cheap thin glass).
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst glassware I have ever seen. Before even getting a chance to use, they broke in the dishwasher. The glass is paper thin, and maybe I'm glad they broke prior to using. If they can't hold up to being washed, I'd hate to have one break while a guest was using them. Don't waste your money on these . Very disappointed that I trusted the reviews and expected a quality glass.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Will hold 12 oz +
customer_reviews.text: Came well packed, in sturdy cardboard Joy Jolt box, as seen in picture above. Very pretty. I put in dishwasher immediately to wash & they came out beautifully. They hold 12 oz perfectly & comfortably without ice & without spillage, & some room to spare. I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomermj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for some nice glasses for awhile and finally found these. They are not too thick but are sturdy and not likely to tip over due to extra weight at the bottom - a feature we really like about Joy Jolt products. Thank you for another great product.
customer_reviews.author: happy gardener

customer_reviews.title: Glass are so thing and break so easily

They are soooooo thin, I think I have 1 left. 1 of them broke in the dishwasher, and the other one, I think broke when it touched a plate. There are better glasses in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses—sturdier than they look

customer_reviews.author: DTC

customer_reviews.title: Thin glass

customer_reviews.author: ayoa2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glasses

customer_reviews.author: Beamer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Clean and Classy

T :-)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, elegant glassware.

customer_reviews.author: RemyE

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile thin glass

customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Highball glasses

customer_reviews.title: Everyone would love these glasses!

customer_reviews.title: Just love the clean neat look of these glasses

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable glasses

customer_reviews.title: Break very easily.

Some broke just from washing them. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M

customer_reviews.title: Different thicknesses but ok for the price

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses!

customer_reviews.title: Broke first time I put in dishwasher

customer_reviews.author: Sherri M

customer_reviews.title: Great product ,
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are gorgeous and classy. Beautiful clean lines, good heft, very durable, easy to clean. . couldn't be more happier with what i ordered

customer_reviews.title: Elegant design! Would be proud to present to guests at parties.
customer_reviews.text: I love the elegant design. Nice heavy bottom with curved sides at inside that adds weight, and visual interest. Top of glass is a bit delicate, but adds to nice balance in the hand. I use it for bourbon, and ginger ale high balls with a column of ice right to the filled to the top of the glass. Keeps drink cold, and makes for an inviting presentation no matter which of your favorite beverage you add to it.

customer_reviews.title: Looking for Bar type glass, don't look here.
customer_reviews.text: I expected glasses with some weight at the bottom. Not so! They break quite easily. Out of four glasses, we have 1 that hasn't broken. I would not recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy M. Strawn

customer_reviews.title: I only have one left out of four!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses split in my dishwasher. Not all at once but over the course of 5 months 3 have been broken when we emptied the dishwasher. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Design Change
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this product in August 2017, and was very happy with the quality and design. Happy enough to immediately order two more boxes. I have since reordered 3 more times. My last purchase November 2019 came with the brand "Joyjolt" etched in the bottom of each glass. It greatly cheapens the look of the glass and will not be used for dinner parties. I will be looking for a similar glass without etching for future purchases.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked these glasses at first, but one by one they broke when I was washing them after it slightly bumped another dish. Talk about fragile. The last one broke not too long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: It's an absolute joy to drink out of these glasses. They are more narrow and delicate, which is what I prefer. I wouldn't consider these to be an everyday glass for a family with kids since the glass feels thin. However, if you want to treat yourself to a special drink in a special glass, I vote for this one. When we opened the box, one of the glass bases in the set was not as deep as the other three. I wrote to the seller and a new one was sent immediately. Seamless!
customer_reviews.author: KP from Arlington

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked and looked for thin crystal highball or iced tea glasses that are not horrifically expensive, and then I found these!! I first ordered 12 and loved them so much, I ordered 4 more for back-up glasses to cover breakage. LOVE the shape and size. Holds more liquid than it appears.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fisler

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses for a wedding gift so haven't used them, but they appear to be very nice glasses I'm sure they will love! They look very solidly made, great size for anything, clean and clear. Very good price and prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M. Vickery

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are attractive and the packaging is very protective. I'm happy with them and happy they arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: K-Man

customer_reviews.title: Classic highball glasses

customer_reviews.author: sw21788

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses to use for making trifles and they were perfect. Very pretty and they washed up nicely in the dishwasher. I expect to use them in the future for cocktail glasses as they are pretty and nicely weighted. I will likely buy more. I can not speak to the durability because I have not had them long, but I do not anticipate any issues. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like them, but they are way too fragile

customer_reviews.author: Albert Kim

customer_reviews.title: Two down, two to go

customer_reviews.title: Look good

customer_reviews.author: Bruce D

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous glasses
customer_reviews.text: They are so beautiful. So elegant. Wasn’t expecting them to be that stylish. Very nice packaging. Expensive looking, sturdy and easy to grab.
customer_reviews.author: maciel

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought three four-packs of these glasses six months ago or so, and to date only one has cracked. In our house that's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Two Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Great company but different quality glasses so be careful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four glasses and while they were beautiful, two broke easily, one in dishwasher after touching another glass and one when I was filling it with ice in the dishwasher. I emailed the company and they were extremely responsive. They sent four new ones right away. The strange thing is the new ones are of a higher quality, heavier, especially at the base. They said because it was shipped through Amazon, it was their mistake and they stand by the quality of their glasses. The second set is awesome. The first set is too light and delicate to be used as every day glasses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pappafotis

customer_reviews.title: Too small

customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: STURDY THEY ARE NOT!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order of four, and only two of the four in this last set remain. The other two glasses and the earlier sets of four broke easily while in ordinary use. I keep ordering them because I like their feel and appearance, hoping that this third try will last somewhat longer. My rating is THREE not FIVE stars!

customer_reviews.title: Beverage tastes better in this glass
customer_reviews.text: Slim design and awesome look. Beverage/beer tastes better when had from this glass with thin rim. Delicate. Must be handled with care.

customer_reviews.title: Clear Chrystal

My husband who is particular about his water glass is pleased with the shape, thin rim and the clarity of the glass. VRWade

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are very narrow!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect

customer_reviews.title: You Won't be disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!

customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Visible Logo makes these look cheap
customer_reviews.text: No where in the description or pictures is it clear that “joyjolt” logo will be fairly sizable and visible in the bottom of the glass. Overall the glass is fine but it keeps me from using them for entertaining
customer_reviews.author: Laura J Brown

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are clear and tinkly crystal, smooth feeling in the hand. They are a little narrower and shorter than I imagined but are stable enough. I use these every day. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Down to 2 out of 4 after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely fragile. 2 have already broken from regular wear and tear that most glasses would survive over and over. The most recent break was just from setting the full glass down on a counter. Don't advertise your glasses as "indestructible" when they shatter so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Breen

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: I just got these glasses because they are crystal and not supposed to get etched by the dishwasher like my glass ones do. I accidentally dropped one onto the terra cotta tile floor and it actually BOUNCED—twice—and did not break or even get scratched! I am going to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: lovely glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely glasses, easy to hold, not too heavy, and beautifully clear. The weight on the bottom is just right. The size is also just right; not too small or too big. Well made and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: While washing new glasses, barely tapped the inside of one with plastic handle of bottle washer and glass cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy D.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Highball Glasses Barware Collins Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Great product as described, solid construction very happy highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K.

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: The description states that the glasses are dishwasher safe. Which is not true. They were securely loaded in dishwasher and broke while the dishwasher was in use. I really liked the look of the glasses but am highly upset that they broke so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied

customer_reviews.title: 'JoyJolt' etched prominently into bottom of glass
customer_reviews.text: This is impossible to tell from any of the promotional material. The brand 'JoyJolt' is etched prominently in the bottom of the glass. It's impossible to not notice this against darker surfaces. This wipes out any of the potentially nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Leefer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, albeit somewhat fragile
customer_reviews.text: Edited: Seller replaced at no cost and included personal note illustrating their commitment to both a quality product and customer service. Original: Two glasses broke, seemingly without impact. Never put through dishwasher, can't explain the break and can't recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: NOT Dishwasher Safe
customer_reviews.text: These glasses were great, up until I put them in the dishwasher. After the first one broke, I started handwashing. Occasionally one would end up in the dishwasher and sure enough, it would shatter. Definitely not dishwasher safe like stated.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Shotland
